Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that helps people communicate over long distances, like a string telephone.
The student can illustrate how sound travels through the string to convey messages.
The student can show the string telephone using only the specified materials provided.
The student can depict how the device sends or receives information across a distance.
The student can include a drawing showing how the use of technology like a string telephone solves the problem of communicating over long distances.
